content: measurements chest width 63 68 72 75 80 86 cm length approx 36 40 44 48 50 52 cm sleeve length 23 26 29 32 35 40 cm or suitable length all measurements are for the finished garment = personal body measurements + movement allowance the measurements are all according to given gauge yarn required sandnes smart 100 % wool superwash 50 g = 100 m * ochre 2527 **or** dark blue 6062 4 5 5 6 7 8 balls * ice blue 6531 **or** natural 1012 1 ball all sizes * natural 1012 **or** burnt ochre 2544 1 ball all sizes note if alternative yarn is used be sure to check the yardage on label is the same as or greater than 50g = 100 m
